content: **a quick and easy project great for using up scraps and makes a excellent gift ** this pattern is for turning the african flower motif into a pincushion african flower pattern not included also available as a photo tutorial 1 style pattern **skill level ** *easy/improver* uses simple stitches experience working in the round would be useful **yarn ** you ll just need a few yards of 4ply/dk/aran or worsted yarn i used debbie bliss baby cashmerino **needles/hook ** a crochet hook or size appropriate for the yarn you re using i used 3 5 mm - e usa **materials ** toy filling or some other stuffing material yarn needle **size ** this will vary depending of the weight of yarn and size of hook you use mine are 8cm/3 across and 3cm/1 high **gauge ** will vary with weight of yarn and size of hook used you just want it to be tight enough to hold a nice shape when stuffed **pattern includes ** * a full written pattern * a photo tutorial style pattern * link to the african flower motif pattern **pattern written in ** uk terms us translations given **translations** german - photo tutorial linked on blog page **cherry heart s cozy corner** please come and join the cherry heart group 2 watch podcasts join crochet/knit alongs share your projects and enjoy yarny chit chat **show me your project** #cherryheart 1 http //sandra-cherryheart blogspot co uk/2013/01/crocheted-african-flower-pincushion html 2 http //www ravelry com/groups/cherry-hearts-cozy-corner
